team.six.androidchat

Class ConnectActivity

  • java.lang.Object
      • team.six.androidchat.Sending_Recieving.Async_Recieve_Messages

  • public class ConnectActivity
extends

    This class contains a method doBackground which overrides a method in the AsyncTask class.

    This method allows us to preform operations in the background without interupting the apps user interface.

    The doBackground method submits an HTTP get request. If the request runs through, the text of the page is returned in a string

    Author:
    Cesar Avalos, Alec Knutsen
    See Also:
    AsyncTask

      Nested Classes

      static class  ConnectActivity.ACTION
      Create a new enum for get and post requests Two commonly used methods for a request-response between a client and server are: GET and POST.

      • ConnectActivity

        public ConnectActivity(TextView chatText,
               ConnectActivity.ACTION state)
        Instantiates instance variables state,chatText,client, and req
        Parameters:
        chatText - the TextView to be modified with all the messages from the chat
        state - the Action which the instance variable state will be set to (represents the HTTP request method, get or post)

        protected java.lang.String doInBackground(java.lang.String... arg0)
        Submits an HTTP get request in the background of the app
        Parameters:
        arg0 - the String... represents an array of strings which can be of varying length [represents session_num in this case].
        Returns:
        returns an empty string
